The Best Eye Care Products to Nourish your Under Eyes

These days being at home, unable to step out even for work, the most exerted and probably taken for granted part of us is our precious eyes. With everything from work to entertainment or shopping being restricted to the online medium, we are constantly glued to our screens. This takes a toll on our eyes and we tend to see the first signs of ageing at the corners or under our eyes in the form of wrinkles or dark circles. While limiting our screen time wherever possible to give proper rest and breaks to our eyes is vital, we must also nourish our eyes and pamper them from time to time. To make up for the loss of shine in our eyes, corners and under-eye, a proper eye care regime at regular intervals is the way to be.

Giving our eyes their due and rightful shut time at night of at least 6-8 hours, taking small rest breaks and cooling our eyes with an eye pack are a few healthy routines. And to repair the damage of dark circles or wrinkles and replenish our eye area, we have bought you here a selectively opted, complete range of eye care products from under eye gels to creams and oils. The spa is not just a luxury for your body but eyes also.

Let’s take a look at the different eye care products that experts vouch for.

1. Mamaearth Bye Bye Dark Circles Eye Cream- The brand offers a range of natural and chemical free products and this eye cream comes with a mixture of cucumber to cool your under eyes and peptides to reduce the melanin deposits on your under eyes causing darkening or puffing. It can be used twice daily to reduce the dark circles, puffiness and just replenish the sensitive skin near the eyes.

2. Biotique Bio Sea Weed Revitalizing Anti Fatigue Eye Gel- A budding brand, Biotique has come up with a nice and light under eye gel to give your eyes a refreshing feel and relieve the effect of stress and fatigue. Some ingredients include chinai ghas, punarnava, bahera, badam, honey and cucumber with Himalayan water. Priced reasonably, it is a steel deal.

3. Lakme Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Night Revivial Eye Cream- Eye repair at night is the best way to ensure that the eyes get time to absorb the product for a good impact. Lakme’s revival eye cream brings to you the luxury skincare nourishment of Argan oil and Opti B Complex to make it radiant and supple. It’s non-sticky and helps make the dullness vanish.

4. Garnier Eye Serum Mask- Complementing the creams and gels, this intense hydration eye serum mask is a simple yet effective way to retain the goodness of your under eyes with its orange juice and hyaluronic acid extracts. It reduces the skin temperature to -4 degrees, cooling your eye area miraculously.

5. Ponds Age Miracle Eye Cream- Here’s the antidote to those ugly eye corner wrinkles that give out the signs of premature ageing at first. With its blur technology that works endlessly throughout the day, Ponds eye cream helps reduce the wrinkle formation and lets you be youthful on the surface and calm on the inside. It also helps to dull pigmentation, fine lines and puffiness.

6. Kama Ayurveda Organic Sweet Almond Oil- Priced at a bit higher range, it is not exactly an eye care product but it is widely proven that almond oil properties work wonders for skin, specially under & around the eyes. It’s 100% natural and organic and gives great results to hydrate & smoothen the under-eye skin with regular massage.

7. Kiehl’s Cream Eye Treatment with Avacado- This is a cream-based product with the goodness of avocado to give a proper rejuvenation treatment to your under eyes with its unique water-in-oil molecule property. It is ophthalmologist-tested and dermatologist-tested for its healing power.

With these amazing range of well-reviewed, tried and tested eyecare products, your eyes will sparkle their inner glory and thank you a million times for giving them their due replenishment after a hectic work day.
